How the fuck do I burn this? What's CP?
Unzip the cp-file with Winrar. Then burn it to a DVD.

its simple

mount the image using clone drive or daemon

then right click to open the files

you will see 

video & audio TS folders

go into nero and choose burn dvd video files

drag both the video & audio folders in

press burn

worked for me
